name: Personal Connected Health Alliance
goal:
The Personal Connected Health Alliance supports a patient/consumer-centered approach to improving health and wellness through personal technology that supports secure clinical-grade data transformed into actionable information based on evidence to change health behaviors and enable management of chronic conditions.

We believe in putting patients/consumers at the center of their care; improving health and wellness through connected health technologies; protecting data privacy and security; ensuring the safe, secure exchange of medical-grade patient health data;removing barriers to connected health technology adoption and deployment
We can do thus by promoting evidence to demonstrate effectiveness; fostering practical innovation; enabling noval partnerships; covening stakeholders to accelerate change; publishing guidelines and promoting standard
